Content.Raw:
计算链表长度，然后删除。

```python
class Solution:
    def removeNthFromEnd(self, head: ListNode, n: int) -> ListNode:
        l = 0
        cur = head
        while cur:
            l += 1
            cur = cur.next
        ind = l - n
        if ind == 0:
            return head.next
        last, cur = None, head
        while ind > 0:
            last = cur
            cur = cur.next
            ind -= 1
        last.next = cur.next
        return head
```

Title: LeetCode-19 删除链表的倒数第N个节点
